item.description:
Tonight is the night many of you have been asking for...

Introduction to the paranormal by Susan Allen. Susan is an expert in her field working with many organizations to investigate the paranormal. She will be proving so much exciting information on (unexplained) energy sources. Susan has many actual cases she has completed that she will share with us tonight, voices, pictures, orbs, things that move with no assistance. She is working on a Lizzie Borden program this weekend.

Susan recently finished another investigation at the Palace theater. Lets ask a lot of question about what goes on up there. My daughter works there and some of her stories are pretty interesting.

So, .. join us for a journey into the spirit world, Susan Allen, Director and Lead INvestigator of SPI will present evidence form some of the SPI's most interesting investigations. You will see some amazing pictures they have captured and you will hear some of their classic electronic voice phenomena audio clips (EVPs) spoken by those who now reside in the next dimension.  Susan will introduce you to spirit orbs- a most controversial subject in the paranormal field.

group.name: Abundance, Empowerment and the Law of Attraction

item.name: Introduction to the paranormal- tonight
